Question
========

One tests H~1~: p = 0.4 against H~2~: p = 0.2 in a random sample of n = 9 observations. Testing quantity is the binomially distributed stochast B, the number of successes in the sample. As the left critical limit, the value 3 is used. The discernment power 1 - Î² is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.92
* 0.94
* 0.99

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.92: Incorrect
* 0.94: Correct
* 0.99: Incorrect
